events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle your refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Here is the order number 123456 and attached are the photos showing that I received the wrong product.
Thank you for the information. We will start the refund process immediately and you should receive the money back within 5 business days.
Thank you for the update, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed on our end and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
We are checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we may assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed as received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with how your refund request was handled.
